GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves up a json object representing a review by id

review.title: Settlers of Catan: Don't Settle For Less
review.review_body: You have stumbled across an uncharted island rich in natural resources, but you are not alone; other adventurers have come ashore too, and the race to settle the island of Catan has begun! Whether you exert military force, build a road to rival the Great Wall, trade goods with ships from the outside world, or some combination of all three, the aim is the same: to dominate the island. Will you prevail? Proceed strategically, trade wisely, and may the odds be in favour.

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: update review votes by review id and return it in json format

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the passed review id

post /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: post a comment for the givin review id and return it in json format

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: delete a comment by comment id
